Title: We Become What We... Frank!
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), John Wells
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Season premiere. The Gallaghers find themselves with money to burn as Carl sells their inheritance from Monica. Meanwhile, Fiona swears off random hookups to focus on her new apartment ...
